version_description:
Enhanced visual effects!
Special gems have a new look!
Improved gameplay
New map marker for hard levels
Performance improvements and bug fixes

Added a new travel host to guide you through the game!
Improved Go! Points collection.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Rewards and sweepstakes are now available!

Added more travel rewards!
New daily gift feature.
Bugs fixes and performance improvements.

Added new travel rewards!
Bugs fixes and performance improvements.

Continue the adventure with 25 new levels, including all new gameplay!
Beat the Tiki God's Challenge to win rewards.
All new travel packages ... earn 50% off a trip to Cabo, a $1,200 savings!
Login each day to receive boosts, powerups, and Go Points.

Continue the adventure with 25 new levels, including all new gameplay!
Beat the Tiki God's Challenge to win rewards.
All new travel packages ... earn 50% off a trip to Cabo, a $1,200 savings!
Login each day to receive boosts, powerups, and Go Points.
All new rewards and deals! Get exclusive local deals near you and save up to 70% off today.

Now redeem your Coins for cash, gift cards and other great rewards!
Open Treasure Chests for big loot and instantly win up to $500!
All new Coin collection gameplay!
More ways to earn free Coins

Gameplay enhancements
Bug fixes

Invite friends and earn coins!
At the end of the game? No problem. Replay levels and keep all your coins, gold and boosts
More ways to earn coins, more ways to get cash and gift cards!

More fun ways to earn coins!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Get a leg up when you start levels with a free booster by watching a video!
Instantly earn cash when your friends install and run the game for the first time.
New and expanded surveys for more ways to earn $$$
Take advantage of new limited time special offers!

Fixed display issues on iPhone X.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

More ways to win big cash!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Sweepstakes! Play to win real cash in the $1,000 Super, $200 Instant, and $50 Daily!
Instant Win Chests ... collect chests to instantly win up to $200
Daily Quests - Complete challenges daily for more chances to win $200!

It's now even easier to enter our sweepstakes.
More ways to earn tickets.
Bug fixes and performance improvements to maximize your fun!

More ways to win big cash!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes to help you win BIG!

More ways to win! You asked, we answered! This update includes new features and under-the-hood improvements aimed at giving you more free chances to win BIG! — and that’s on top of the challenging puzzles and fun!

* The Tiki Challenge now runs twice-a-week, so you can double your chances for big wins.
* Even better — free scratchers now unlock three times as often!
* Free boosts! The Tiki Challenge now offers free boosts for each level. Challenge accepted!
* Lots of other improvements and pesky bug fixes!

’Tis the season for WINNERS! Get matching and winning cash rewards in a new version with lots of little stocking stuffers, like:
* More Power Hour opportunities!
* Additional promos for gold and boosts.
* Performance improvements all around. Smoother gameplay makes it more fun!
* Lots of bug fixes!
Tap to scratch -- and WIN!

New year, new you! With hopefully some more cash in your pocket, too! This update has several new items and ways to win, which we hope you’ll enjoy.
* More ways to win! Look throughout the game for more instant-win opportunities of up to $1,000. Be sure to update your device notification settings so you’ll see all the latest news and events.
* Get your winnings faster! We’ve updated our payout systems to speed up prize fulfillment.
* Say aloha to new music!
* Many, many bug fixes and performance improvements. We’re constantly checking under the hood for ways to make the game better and faster.
Tap to scratch and win! We have winners every single day, and you could be next!
Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bonjour! Quoi de neuf?
What’s up, you ask? Oh, it’s only our biggest update ever!
* Bienvenue à Paris! A whole new city with 50 new levels to enjoy! Challenging puzzles and more ways to win!
* Many, many back-end improvements and bug fixes that improve overall performance.
* Updates to our automated payout systems, which means you’ll get your winnings faster than ever.
Tap to scratch and win! Winners every day!
À tout à l’heure! See you soon!

It’s the New Biggest Update Ever!
* Our Super Sweepstakes now offers a grand prize of $5,000! Someone is guaranteed to win BIG!
* Spin our new Prize Wheel! You’ll earn free spins every day where you can win cash, gold and Tokens!
* Introducing Tokens, a new focus for your gameplay. You’ll use Tokens to get Tickets for the improved Daily and Super Sweepstakes.
* Welcome to San Francisco with new levels to enjoy!
Tap to scratch and win! Winners every day!

It’s the New Biggest Update Ever!
* Our Super Sweepstakes now offers a grand prize of $5,000! Someone is guaranteed to win BIG!
* Spin our new Prize Wheel! You’ll earn free spins every day where you can win cash, gold and Tokens!
* Introducing Tokens, a new focus for your gameplay. You’ll use Tokens to get Tickets for the improved Daily and Super Sweepstakes.
* Welcome to San Francisco with new levels to enjoy!
Tap to scratch and win! Winners every day!

It’s the New Biggest Update Ever!
* Our Super Sweepstakes now offers a grand prize of $5,000! Someone is guaranteed to win BIG!
* Spin our new Prize Wheel! You’ll earn free spins every day where you can win cash, gold and Tokens!
* Introducing Tokens, a new focus for your gameplay. You’ll use Tokens to get Tickets for the improved Daily and Super Sweepstakes.
* Welcome to San Francisco with new levels to enjoy!
Tap to scratch and win! Winners every day!
In this release we bring you better performance plus we squashed some bugs so you can have more fun and win big!

Time to see the sights of one of the oldest cities in Europe...Rome! This update has several new items, which we hope you’ll enjoy, and they all lead to winning real cash rewards!
* Visit Rome, with 50 new, challenging levels and instant-win opportunities!
* New ways to earn Gold, Tokens and Boosts. Be sure to try out all the goodies and free boosts!
* Several under-the-hood performance improvements.
Pack your bags. Ciao!

G’day from Sydney! Our latest update has tons to offer and lots of opportunities to win real cash rewards!
* Venture down under to Sydney, with 50 new levels and new opportunities to collect instant-win scratchers.
* Free goodies, free boosts and more are available for you to keep winning and winning!
* Multiple behind-the-scenes improvements to ensure smooth gameplay.
Grab your surfboard and favorite cricket bat, because it’s time to play!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
In this update we've added Amazon Gift Cards and news ways to save your progress with Apple Sign In.
Performance improvements and bug fixes so you can win BIG!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

The Holidays are here and the snow has arrived. Enjoy all new scratcher cards in this winter themed update!
And have we talked about our latest feature? Win some pocket money in CASH DASH! Be one of the first to cross the finish line and you will take home your winnings straight to PayPal.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
